rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses neutral language without high-potency verbs or potent metaphors.
This segment reports on economic impact (costs), which are financial/trade metrics (Q3 rule 6).
Segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports economic impact but contains no explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a minimiser combined with a scale contrast.
The segment states the industry has been passing on costs, but contains no bare negation.
Describes economic impact ('industry has been passing on higher poultry costs').
Reports economic data ('higher poultry costs') using a standard verb ('passing on').
